meaningMnemonic: Having a <kanji>furthermore</kanji> <kanji>renewal</kanji> means things become <vocabulary>all the more</vocabulary>... good, bad, cute, ugly, whatever it is you’re talking about! Or, on the opposite side of things, <vocabulary>still less</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
